vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἀππιος, -ου, ὁ
Appius; Ἀππίου Φόρον, Appii Forum (Market of Appius), a town in Italy: Act.28:15.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef: § the forum, or marketplace, of Appius; a village on the Appian road, near Rome, Acts 28:15*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: foro de Apio (burgo al sur de Roma) (4 A-1)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞比烏 这个專有地名在原文的意思是 "Appius的市集"
義大利的一個城鎮,;在離羅馬六十公里的"亞壁古道"上(徒 28:15)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚比乌 这个专有地名在原文的意思是 "Appius的市集"
义大利的一个城镇,;在离罗马六十公里的"亚壁古道"上(徒 28:15)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Áp-bi-u hoặc Áp-pi-u (Phô-rum của), tên của một thành phố phía nam của Rô-ma
